price: 9. Ce Coran conduit vers la voie de la droiture, et annonce aux croyants qui accomplissent les bonnes œuvres qu’ils seront grandement récompensés,
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ يَهۡدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقۡوَمُ وَيُبَشِّرُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā al-qur'āna yahdī lillatī hiya aqwamu wayubashiru al-mu'minīna alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran kabīran
